channel.title: Rune-Dimension Icons Request
channel.description:
Hi Graphic Masters, I'm looking for a person that might draw the following things for my forums: [u] Board Icon [/u]with the words RD, same color as default SMF board icons size: [img]http://birchy08.ulmb.com/Themes/default/images/off.gif[/img] Note: Make it look like theres maybe a flash on corners, like those on Default ones. [u] Award Icons:[/u]
[u]Donator Award:[/u] Coin, $ sign with text saying Donator Award Size: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/pikastaff.gif[/img]
[u]Staff Icon:[/u] Bulbasaur, saying R-D Staff Size: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/pikastaff.gif[/img]
[u]Mod Icon:[/u] Pikachu, saying R-D Mod Size: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/pikastaff.gif[/img]
[u]Gfx Master:[/u] Slaking (Pokemon) saying GFX Master Size: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/pikastaff.gif[/img]
[u]Posts Award [/u]Makuhita (Pokemon) saying Posts Award Size: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/pikastaff.gif[/img]
URGENCY: 10/10
That's all, If you are looking for the pokemon icons, they are found at: [url=http://www.geocities.com/King_Arebor/pkss.html]http://www.geocities.com/King_Arebor/pkss.html[/url]
Thank you once again, the reward will be a GFX Master award on our following forums: [url=http://rune-dimension.info]http://rune-dimension.info[/url]

item.title: Rune-Dimension Icons Request
item.dc:creator: @Coder-Ben Coder-Ben
item.description:
@Coder-Ben wrote:

Greeny:

Anyone called “Coder-*” is born to fail, but that aside, let’s all stay on topic.

I guess your wrong on the fail section but for the name, you might be right, I’ll think of an “original” name. Thanks…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2008, 02:45:52 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Greeny, post:9, topic:217214”]Anyone called “Coder-*” is born to fail, but that aside, let’s all stay on topic.[/quote]

I called myself Di0x1de, no more complains or else that’ll be really gay…

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Dimension Icons Request
item.dc:creator: @Coder-Ben Coder-Ben
item.description:
@Coder-Ben wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

Way to go! 14 members! You’ll probably get about 28, and it’ll remain that way until the site is shut down. So just give up. The reason Moparscape is mainly discussed on http://www.moparisthebest.com/ than any other site is because that is it’s home. So just give up. Your site will be completely unsuccessful.

Actually moron, we tested our community on a free url, http://rune-dimension.co.nr and got 47 members in 3 days. I’m not giving up and you can just stop flaming.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Dimension Icons Request

item.description:
@Coder-Ben wrote:

Hi Graphic Masters, I’m looking for a person that might draw the following things for my forums:

Board Icon with the words RD, same color as default SMF board icons
size:
Note: Make it look like theres maybe a flash on corners, like those on Default ones.

Award Icons:

Donator Award: Coin, $ sign with text saying Donator Award
Size:

Staff Icon: Bulbasaur, saying R-D Staff
Size:

Mod Icon: Pikachu, saying R-D Mod
Size:

Gfx Master: Slaking (Pokemon) saying GFX Master
Size:

Posts Award Makuhita (Pokemon) saying Posts Award
Size:

URGENCY: 10/10

That’s all, If you are looking for the pokemon icons, they are found at:
http://www.geocities.com/King_Arebor/pkss.html

Thank you once again, the reward will be a GFX Master award on our following forums:
http://rune-dimension.info
